comments.author: evan@tseng.io
comments.creator: evan@tseng.io
comments.raw_text:
Hi Wesley,

The file[1] lists all of our dependency modules of our sensorweb-backend[2] module.

The dependency module names and its licenses:
* body-parser: MIT[3]
* express: MIT[4]
* mongoose: MIT[5]
* shortid: MIT[6]

[1]: https://github.com/evanxd/sensorweb-backend/blob/master/package.json
[2]: https://github.com/evanxd/sensorweb-backend
[3]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/body-parser
[4]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/express
[5]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/mongoose
[6]: https://www.npmjs.com/package/shortid
comments.text:

The file[1] lists all of our dependency modules of our sensorweb-backend[2] module.

The dependency module names and its licenses:
